name: GiveMeTap
headline: We produce & sell stainless steel water bottles that enables peopleâ¦
description:
GiveMeTap is a social enterprise. Our mission is to make clean drinking water available to everyone, everywhere.

We create stainless steel water bottles, and each bottle funds 5 years of clean water for someone in Africa. When you get a GiveMeTap bottle, you also have access to the free-water network of cafes and shops who give free tap water to people on the go. No questions, no hassle.

We build water projects in remote villages and elect a water committee to run the maintenance of the water. So far we have made an impact in Namibia, Malawi, and Ghana to bring clean water for the first time.

We like to think of this as âWater for You, Water for Everyoneâ.

We help awesome companies create custom bottles for their staff, customers, and events so that they can stay hydrated, reduce plastic waste and help fund water projects. Our partners include:

Deloitte
HSBC
YCombinator
Google
TED
Flexport
Legal & General
Richard Branson's The Lodge, Switzerland
Cambridge University 

Want to get your company involved? Visit http://bit.ly/2j2Ef64

Water for you. Water for everyone.

## Gift Unique Bottles
Reduce plastic waste, give a present people will actually want (and use) and help change lives.
[Design Yours](http://givemetap.com/</pages/cobrand>)
![](http://www.givemetap.com/cdn/shop/files/DSC00109.jpg?v=1715800799&width=5760)
![](http://www.givemetap.com/cdn/shop/files/Fushimi-dope-web2_ebdb6080-9004-41b9-b486-1bee401371be.png?v=1715800667&width=1400)
**BRANDS THAT USE OUR BOTTLES**
![](http://www.givemetap.com/cdn/shop/files/givemetap-google.png?v=1715846013&width=240)
![](http://www.givemetap.com/cdn/shop/files/givemetap-uber.png?v=1715846013&width=240)

![](http://www.givemetap.com/cdn/shop/files/cheering-with-bottles.jpg?v=1613158306&width=3840)
##  116,391 people with clean water for life 
We give 20% of our revenue to fund water projects in Africa. That ends up being much more than giving 100% of our profits. We donate first, before we take our salaries and everything else. We’re completely focused on giving. That’s why it’s in our name.
####  2.1 Billion fewer plastic bottles in landfilles
![](http://www.givemetap.com/cdn/shop/files/more-than-a-bottle.png?v=1715796861&width=3840)
## Designed For Life On The Go
Super lightweight and durable, it won’t break and contains no BPA or any other potentially harmful substances. 
##### Get Free Water Refills
Your GiveMeTap bottle gives you access to the Water Network, which is an ever-growing group of cafes and restaurants who will fill your GiveMeTap bottle for free. Yes. Free. Bye bottled water. 
[![GiveMeTap](http://www.givemetap.com/cdn/shop/files/logo-cs4_right_colour---500px-width_dd658bce-ed51-4d30-8a5e-3d418d2a636d.png?v=1698974652&width=300) ](http://givemetap.com/</>)

  * [Our story](http://givemetap.com/</pages/about-us>)
  * [Co-brand](http://givemetap.com/</pages/cobrand-givemetap-bottles>)

Get Involved
  * [Buy bottles](http://givemetap.com/</collections/shop>)
  * [List your shop](http://givemetap.com/</pages/join-givemetap>)
  * [Get in touch](http://givemetap.com/</pages/contact-us>)


Our Impact
With your Give Me Tap bottle, you can enjoy free water refills from a network of shops, cafes and bars.
What’s more, every bottle sold provides 5 years of clean water to someone living in Africa. 
**Water for You. Water for Everyone.**

##  116,391 people with clean water for life 
We give 20% of our revenue to fund water projects in Africa. That ends up being much more than giving 100% of our profits. We donate first, before we take our salaries and everything else. We’re completely focused on giving. That’s why it’s in our name.
####  2.1 Billion fewer plastic bottles in landfilles
![](http://www.givemetap.com/cdn/shop/files/more-than-a-bottle.png?v=1715796861&width=3840)
## Designed For Life On The Go
Super lightweight and durable, it won’t break and contains no BPA or any other potentially harmful substances. 
##### Get Free Water Refills
Your GiveMeTap bottle gives you access to the Water Network, which is an ever-growing group of cafes and restaurants who will fill your GiveMeTap bottle for free. Yes. Free. Bye bottled water.

generated_description:
**GiveMeTap: Redefining Hydration with a Purpose**

Founded in 2011 and notable for being part of Y Combinator's Batch W15, GiveMeTap is a London-based social enterprise on a mission to ensure clean drinking water is available to everyone, everywhere. They achieve this through a simple yet effective approach: every stainless steel water bottle sold funds five years of clean water for someone in Africa. 

When you purchase a GiveMeTap bottle, you not only contribute to a noble cause but also gain access to their free-water network. This network includes cafes and shops committed to providing complimentary refills to bottle owners, making hydration on the go easy and accessible—sans the guilt of single-use plastic.

**Impact and Reach**

With projects established in Namibia, Malawi, and Ghana, GiveMeTap has already improved the lives of over 116,391 people by giving them access to clean water for life. Their philosophy is “Water for You, Water for Everyone,” which underscores a commitment to sustainability. The company operates with a model where 20% of their revenue directly benefits these water projects, reflecting a robust focus on social impact over profit.

They’ve partnered with some impressive names—including Deloitte, HSBC, Google, and Richard Branson's The Lodge in Switzerland—helping businesses customize bottles for their teams and events. This not only promotes a more sustainable work culture but also helps in reducing plastic waste.

**Sustainability at the Core**

GiveMeTap’s stainless steel bottles are a durable alternative to plastic, contributing to a significant reduction in plastic waste. Their mission aligns well with the growing global awareness around environmental sustainability.

In a nutshell, GiveMeTap is not just selling water bottles; they are fostering a movement towards conscious consumption and social responsibility. Their commitment is clear: hydrate yourself while uplifting communities in need. So, if you're looking to make a purchase, or simply want to explore their offerings, head over to [GiveMeTap's website](http://givemetap.com) and join them on this journey of hydration with purpose.
